title: RIOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOT
body: rito one ranked game i left because my internet went out for a second ,and when i reconnected my teammates remaked and  in the end even tho i reconnected i still lost lp ,please help

replies.body: It sucks that you were able to come back just in time to see that remake happen, but ultimately your team was prompted for a remake and made the decision to follow through since they weren't sure if they would have a full team or not.
You left the game and they remaked. Nothing can be done now. The Ranked System is automatic and Riot cannot help you.
